name: Tome of Ymir [3]
description: Tome that contains the secrets of Rune Midgard. Bestows limitless knowledge.
bonuses: Enables use of level 10 [Soul Drain] and regain 2 SP for each normal attack
No cast time with [Memorize] and [Double Casting]
Pierce 10% of enemy MDEF when using [Fire Bolt], [Cold Bolt], [Lightning Bolt], or [Earth Spike]
15% Aftercast Reduction with [Fire Bolt], [Cold Bolt], [Lightning Bolt]
Earth Spike Mastered: Add a 50% chance to cause Stone Curse status after using [Earth Spike]
Autospell Mastered: Add ASPD +12% and FLEE +15 during [Autospell]
Endow Skills have 100% success rate, regardless of skill level. Instances/PvP/WoE: Consume no catalyst
Increase [Wall of Fog] limit to 3. Remove [Wall of Fog] on unequip
Increase the AoE of [Volcano], [Deluge], and [Violent Gale] to 11x11. Cancel these skills on unequip
PvM: 80% Aftercast Reduction with [Soul Exchange] and restore 50% more SP with [Health Conversion]
25% more damage with [Thunderstorm] and [Heaven's Drive]. 200% more damage with [Fire Ball]
